evidence_example.title: resource demo
evidence_example.small_descr: A minimal EE demo for the MONOSTACK case with the MPC5674 evaluation board. It runs under Lauterbach simulation environment.
evidence_example.long_descr:
Resource demo: A minimal EE demo for the MONOSTACK case with the MPC5674 evaluation board. It runs under Lauterbach simulation environment. The demo uses the following peripherals:
  • LEDs;
  • Buttons;
